thread.section_title: Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Really Nice. A Bit Different.
thread.title_full: Really Nice. A Bit Different. - Review of Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PaulMM1234
title: Really Nice. A Bit Different.
text:
More apartment than hotel, more American model. The beds and rooms are very clean, my room also had a full kitchen.
There is no 'dinner' available but 2 pubs within short walk. As you go out door to the right there is a nice but busy pub 2 mins away. If you go left then next left, 5 mins away was 'The Rose', quieter and really nice.
Large breakfast option included in price. Tube 5 mins away, didn't use, was uber'ing and they were only ever 2 mins away.
Overall excellent, quiet, clean hotel. Would definitely stay again.
